item.title: How do i make my server HD & LD at the same time? :confused:
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Run two servers at the same timeâ€¦ but on different ports and make them connect to a ftp server to keep the character files. You will have to make both servers save and load files in the exact same way for this to work

Rubiks Scape is in both HD and LD (317 and 508)
